page.title: 01SCOTTISH HIGHLANDS
page.content: We live in the Scottish Highlands about 4km from Inverness. The land in our area is mostly rural and in the main sparsely populated but stretches into the suburbs of Inverness where a lot of new houses are being built. The houses in Bunchrew are mostly recently built. Most of the people work in Inverness, and usually travel there by car. If people want to go swimming, skating, to the theatre or cinema, they have to travel to Inverness. There is only one small shop in our village and people either drive or get the bus to the supermarkets or stores in the town.
